TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MultiViewControlBuilder extends System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder

Docs.summary: Interacts with the parser to build a control.

block.para: To create a custom control builder for a derived control, you need to inherit from this class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor() cil managed

Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig virtual instance void AppendSubBuilder(class System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder subBuilder) cil managed

Docs.param: The object assigned to the child control.
Docs.summary: Adds builders to the object for any child controls that belong to the control.

remarks.format: ## Remarks This method adds builders to the <xref:System.Web.UI.ControlBuilder> object for any child controls that belong to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control. A <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.MultiView> control can contain only <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.View> controls as child controls.
